Prepare normalized predictors and extract labels

prepare_knn_data.Rd

Prepare normalized predictors and extract labels

Usage

prepare_knn_data(df_train, df_test, target = "default_payment_next_month")

Arguments

df_train

Training data

df_test

Testing data

target

Column name of target variable

Value

A list with normalized train/test data and labels

Examples

df <- data.frame(
  feature1 = c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5),
  feature2 = c(5, 4, 3, 2, 1),
  default_payment_next_month = c(0, 1, 0, 1, 0)
)
split <- split_dataset(df)
prepare_knn_data(split$train, split$test, "default_payment_next_month")
#> $train
#>    feature1  feature2
#> 1 0.0000000 1.0000000
#> 2 0.3333333 0.6666667
#> 3 0.6666667 0.3333333
#> 4 1.0000000 0.0000000
#> 
#> $test
#>   feature1 feature2
#> 1      NaN      NaN
#> 
#> $train_labels
#> [1] 0 1 0 1
#> Levels: 0 1
#> 
#> $test_labels
#> [1] 0
#> Levels: 0
#>
